document_data.name: Talking Owl
document_data.mainbody: '''Talking owls''' were particularly wise [[owl]]s that could speak many languages.

Society.Habitats:
In the wilds of [[Faerûn]] these creatures could be found in the [[Tun Marshes]], [[Cormanthor]], [[Cormyr]], [[Sembia]], the [[Dalelands]], and in the land of [[Thar]].

Beyond Faerûn, talking owls could be found in the [[Katakoro Plateau]].
Society.Relationships:
Powerful [[Zakhara]]n [[bard]]s were known to take talking owls as followers.

[[Eldath]] sometimes acted through talking owls.

document_data.Notable Talking Owls:
* [[Fray (talking owl)|Fray]], a talking owl that lived around [[Silverbark's forest]].<ref>{{Cite dungeon/61/To Save a Forest|51}}
* [[Isimud]], the leader of the [[Unther]]ic [[Enclave]], had a talking owl named [[Ibuth]] as a familiar.
document_data.Trivia: * Talking owls could be summoned using the ''[[find companion]]'' [[spell]].{{Cite dragon/228/Greater Familiars of Faerûn|77-78, 80}}
